thread.title: Blackstone’s James Hands No. 2 Job at Private-Equity Giant to Jonathan Gray

author: Miriam Gottfried
title: Blackstone’s James Hands No. 2 Job at Private-Equity Giant to Jonathan Gray
text:
Hamilton “Tony” James is handing over day-to-day management of Blackstone Group LP to Jonathan Gray, solidifying Mr. Gray’s role as heir-apparent to Chief Executive Stephen A. Schwarzman.
Mr. Gray, who runs the firm’s $115 billion real-estate business, will become president and chief operating officer, reporting to Mr. Schwarzman, the private-equity firm said in a press release Tuesday. Mr. James will continue in a full-time role as executive vice chairman.
